Token: Your Discord token, get one from https://discord.com/developers/applications.
UserID: The User ID of the Discord account of the system you want to track. Probably yours.
PluralKitToken: The PluralKit API token, get it with 'pk;token'.
LogChannel: Log channel where switch logs will go.
//: The below key is a map of Unicode emote code points to PluralKit member IDs. Fill it out as you wish. You should probably remove this comment.
